description: Returns details about an insight that you specify using its ID.

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: The name of the cluster to describe the insight for.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identity of the insight to describe.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the insight.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the insight.

nested_items.name: category
nested_items.description: The category of the insight.

nested_items.name: kubernetesVersion
nested_items.description: The Kubernetes minor version associated with an insight if applicable.

nested_items.name: lastRefreshTime
nested_items.description: The time Amazon EKS last successfully completed a refresh of this insight check on the cluster.

nested_items.name: lastTransitionTime
nested_items.description: The time the status of the insight last changed.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the insight which includes alert criteria, remediation recommendation, and additional resources (contains Markdown).

nested_items.name: insightStatus
nested_items.description: An object containing more detail on the status of the insight resource.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the resource.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: Explanation on the reasoning for the status of the resource.

nested_items.name: recommendation
nested_items.description: A summary of how to remediate the finding of this insight if applicable.

nested_items.name: additionalInfo
nested_items.description: Links to sources that provide additional context on the insight.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: The details about each resource listed in the insight check result.

nested_items.name: insightStatus
nested_items.description: An object containing more detail on the status of the insight resource.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the resource.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: Explanation on the reasoning for the status of the resource.

nested_items.name: kubernetesResourceUri
nested_items.description: The Kubernetes resource URI if applicable.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) if applicable.

nested_items.name: categorySpecificSummary
nested_items.description: Summary information that relates to the category of the insight. Currently only returned with certain insights having category UPGRADE_READINESS.

nested_items.name: deprecationDetails
nested_items.description: The summary information about deprecated resource usage for an insight check in the UPGRADE_READINESS category.

nested_items.name: usage
nested_items.description: The deprecated version of the resource.

nested_items.name: replacedWith
nested_items.description: The newer version of the resource to migrate to if applicable.

nested_items.name: stopServingVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the software where the deprecated resource version will stop being served.

nested_items.name: startServingReplacementVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the software where the newer resource version became available to migrate to if applicable.

nested_items.name: clientStats
nested_items.description: Details about Kubernetes clients using the deprecated resources.

nested_items.name: userAgent
nested_items.description: The user agent of the Kubernetes client using the deprecated resource.

nested_items.name: numberOfRequestsLast30Days
nested_items.description: The number of requests from the Kubernetes client seen over the last 30 days.

nested_items.name: lastRequestTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last request seen from the Kubernetes client.

nested_items.name: addonCompatibilityDetails
nested_items.description: A list of AddonCompatibilityDetail objects for Amazon EKS add-ons.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon EKS add-on.

nested_items.name: compatibleVersions
nested_items.description: The list of compatible Amazon EKS add-on versions for the next Kubernetes version.
(string) ---
